僛字的基本解释

僛
qī
〔僛僛〕a.摇晃着身子；b.不整齐，如“城云如雪柳僛僛。”

僛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qī］
［《廣韻》去其切，平之，溪。］
(1)摇曳倾侧貌。参见“僛僛”。
(2)丑陋。参见“僛醜”。

僛字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　僛； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页116第26
【唐韻】去其切【集韻】【韻會】丘其切，?音欺。【說文】醉舞貌。【詩·小雅】屢舞僛僛。【註】傾側狀。凡不能自正者，皆謂之僛。通作敧。

僛字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
僛字的起名意思

暂无。

僛
Basic explanation of words
僛
qī
[僛僛] a. Shaking the body; b. Irregular, such as "City clouds are like snow and willows."
僛
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qī］
["Guangyun" go to Qiqie, Pingzhi, Xi. ]
(1) Swaying and tilting side profile. See "僛僛".
(2) Ugly. See "僛ugly".
僛
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　僛; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 116 Page 26
[Tang Yun] Go to Qiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Qiu Qiqie, sound deceived. [Said the text] Drunk dance appearance. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Dancing repeatedly. [Note] Inclined shape. Those who are unable to correct themselves are called 僛. Pass for 敧.
